LanguageData.PPotionFlake.label: Flake potion
LanguageData.PPotionFlake.description: A flaky white liquid of psychite that can be drunk to produce a powerful euphoric state. While it is cheap to produce and extremely pleasurable to use, it is exceptionally addictive. Flake is known for destroying lives, communities, and entire societies.
LanguageData.PPotionGoJuice.label: Go-juice potion
LanguageData.PPotionGoJuice.description: The Go-juice potion blocks pain, increases movement speed, and improves the user's melee and shooting abilities.
LanguageData.PPotionHealer.label: Healing potion
LanguageData.PPotionHealer.description: A potion to heal health conditions. It heals the single worst health condition affecting someone at any given time. Works even on health conditions that would otherwise be incurable. They can even form new limbs or organs as needed.
LanguageData.PPotionKnowledge.label: Potion of knowledge
LanguageData.PPotionKnowledge.description: A potion to teach you. When used, the potion will teach you the technology you're currently researching, instantly and for free.
LanguageData.PPotionLife.label: Potion of life
LanguageData.PPotionLife.description: A potion to resurrect the dead. Unfortunately, the resurrected sometimes come back with brain damage, blindness, or progressive psychosis. Outcomes are better when the ´potion is administered to a fresher body. If a body is preserved, it can even be resurrected long after death.
LanguageData.PPotionLuciferium.label: Luciferium potion
LanguageData.PPotionLuciferium.description:
A potion that dramatically improve the body's functioning in all respects. Over time, it can even heal old scarred-over wounds or brain damage, though it cannot regenerate lost limbs. Unfortunately, without the moderating effects of regular doses every five or six days, the potion lose cohesion, causing continuous berserk rages and, eventually, death.
After the first dose, there is no way to get the potion out, ever.
LanguageData.PPotionSaturation.label: Potion of saturation
LanguageData.PPotionSaturation.description: A Potion of saturation, brewed for use in survival situations. While it never rots, it can still deteriorate if left outside. Great for traveling.

LanguageData.PPotionWakeUp.label: Wake-up potion
LanguageData.PPotionWakeUp.description: The Wake-up potion fills the user's need for rest, and allows users to work for extended periods without getting tired. However, repeated use will produce an addiction which reduces mental performance and can even generate psychotic breaks.
LanguageData.PPotionYayo.label: Yayo potion
LanguageData.PPotionYayo.description: When drunk, it produces a rapid euphoric high, dramatically reduces the user's need for rest, and suppresses pain. Like all forms of psychite, it is addictive, though it is not as addictive as the cruder flake.
